nodes.text: The Ugnaught Kuiil was a member of a clan sometime during the Imperial Era. After paying his debt, Kuiil left the clan to live a life of solitude as a moisture farmer on the desert world of Arvala-7.
Kuiil's clan was mentioned in "Chapter 7: The Reckoning," the seventh episode of the Disney+ television series, The Mandalorian, which aired on December 18, 2019.
